name: Katou Megumi (Saekano)
description:
Lora model for Katou Megumi from Saekano. I used it with weight 0.8.

I trained this cute girl in a different way but seems to mostly work fine ^_^ I noticed it's harder now on the website to include whole set of words in model parameters so I'll just be listing them in description more clearly.

Main prompt - katou megumi

Ponytail hairstyle - ponytail

Iconic outdoors outfit - white dress, red jacket, neck ribbon, beret, white thighhighs, frills, bow, mary janes. If you are a man ignorant to female fashion like me, mary janes are the shoes.

School uniform outfit - school uniform, white sailor collar, pleated skirt, kneehighs, loafers. I messed up training here a bit and about half the time you will get white uniform >_<

Bikini outfit - striped bikini, optionally sunglasses, eyewear on head.
